Text:
I wish this damn global warming hysteria was actually true... Its damn cold. what happened to global warming...? im freezing my butt off damnit! 3rd coldest October in recorded history!  Its damn cold during this global warming. Yep the colder it gets is proof that global warming is real, the warmer it gets its proof global warming is real, if its cloudy its global warming, if it snows its global warming, if its sunny its global warming, if its record cold temperature, you guessed it... Global warming!
I just wish global warming meant it was getting warmer cause im damn cold!

The world goes through changes in temperature. Ice age, Tropical age and then back to Ice age again. We are witnessing the peak of the warmer climate before it starts going back to another Ice age again.

Carbon Dioxide and CFC's causing global warming be damned. A couple of decades ago, it was nuclear testing. Before that it was factories and pollution. I guess when the temperatures start going back down again, it's going to be another disaster caused by humans again.

Yes, Yes, Global Warming is horse shit.

But this slimy turd is worth downloading to show your kids how they shit lies right in your fucking face.

Or you can admit this conspiracy theory is highly unlikely and believe the 97.5% of climate scientists who tells us we are heading for disaster. Follow the money: Those most outspoken agaist agw, are they perchance sponsored by the fossile fuel industry?
